*******************
Spicy Potato Wedges
*******************

Ingredients
##########

* 3 Baking Potatoes
* 1 teaspoon of salt
* 1 teaspoon of garlic salt
* 1 teaspoon of pepper
* 1 teaspoon of cumin
* 1 teaspoon paprika
* 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
* 4 teaspoons of vegtable oil

Method
######

#. Bake the potatoes until almost done
#. Once cool cut into Wedges
#. Combine the salt, garlic salt, pepper , cumin , parika, cayenne pepper and oil
#. Season the potato wedges with the mixture
#. Cook for around 20 minutes
